reviews.review: класс
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lzeOIaBNpa0

After a While i think im ready to write a review on this game sooo, here we go.

On the beginning its a nice little game of a hunt. You can either be a Hunter or the prey and experience the thrill of the hunt on either side and it gives the game a nice vibe and there is a lot to explore and you are having fun either as a survivor or a killer.

As you play more and more you realize some perks are useless, some are clutch, some are MUST and some are just dirty broken. (i don't blame killers for bringing NOED cause its mostly a must atp)

You play more. You get better either as a killer or a survivor and start to rank up which just gives you an awesome feeling knowing how you improve and making your own playstyle, having your favourite killers and survivors (even though after a while the difference between survivors is just how they sound and look) and you probably having a lot of fun playing more and more

You start to get easily frustrated since there is a LOT of times that you feel powerless. You distracted the killer that found you for like 10 minutes before he/she was able to catch you... why there are no gens that are done?! or it took me forever to catch this Meg with Dead Hard and 3000 hours of looping experience just to realize its a survive with friends, the gens are done all of your totems are gone and you just got blinded by her friend making you drop her and she is miles away now teabaging at the exit gates while pointing at you. 

The game can be really fun but feeling hope and powerless is just when you want to dc, uninstall ect especially as a Killer who is suppose to have the power, the control

Soon you realize that its nothing more than a bullying simulator. The Killer is the big silent kid and the survivors are the small loud kids and who is the bully? It depends on the match. If the survivors are working together then they are the typical elementary school bullies who can't do anything to you physically but they throw rocks and mean words at you then run away if you try to beat them up. If they are bad then the killer becomes the big bully that beats up the children. Notice how i say it depends on the survivors? In the very end it only does. With Clutch perks and good comunication the killer has no chance its a 4 on 1 afterall. 2 can easily distract the killer while the other 2 rushes down the gens in the matter of minutes.

Overall the concept of the game is good its amazingly good. Both killers and Survivors are very likeable and loveable their stories are amazing and each could easily make it into a horror movie anytime (not looking at movie killers like Myers ect) but the gameplay is too simple and rely on that very heavily which makes the game VERY difficult to balance. In order to make the game TRULY ballanced the base of the game should be reworked, but no one wants that soooooo..... yeah.

Thats All. I do recommend this game just don't blame me if you regret it out of salt.
Im sorry for all the new players I have encountered

Das Spiel hat mich schon seit der ersten Spielstunde Positiv überrascht. Zu Anfang noch ein gruseliges Spielerlebnis und später dann eines der Süchtigsten spiele in der Bibliothek. Dead by daylight (DBD) ist für mich und viele andere meiner Freunde ein sehr tolles Spiel. Es werden auf jedenfall noch viele Updates folgen und genau dass macht DBD so Interessant. Viel Erfolg in dem Spiel für jeden der diese Review gelesen hat. :D

Dead by Daylight used to be my favorite game, i´ve played it 24/7 the last few years. It was Fun, i met some nice people and i also bought a lot for cosmetics and stuff.

But the last few updates did the game dirty, it wasn´t fun anymore, the killers get BUFFED and the survivors NERFED. This is not how balancing is working...

The Map reworks are also VERY very unbalanced: Loobs getting destroyd, some doors are blocked by the new annoying "pallet-doors" wich kills you most of the time...

Hitboxes ... i dont even want to start with these...  XD

Survivor-perks: the old and good perk got changed to the bad, the new perk that are coming are mostly bad too -.-

okay okay, my words to this Community and Game: This game used to be fun back in 2016-2019. 2020 began to change the hole game in the negative direction...  Yeah i met some nice people i'm still in contact with, and i am also glad i´ve met them! 
But i hope for behavior that they fix the game and bring up some old game elements.

I am totally done with this game, aint fun at all and the community is TOXIC as hell, so if you want to have fun and stuff : Look for other games ... please :)

A Little buggy at times, overall fun game. Also devote time and effort into this game you can’t jump in just assume you’ll be as good as No0b3 or Monto but in time you will get there. Also fix ranking system getting into a lobby of 20’s sucks!!!

This is a good game. I've had this game since release, I just never get time to play it. What I can say, is it has come a long way since its original version. The game itself is about as balanced as it can be, for the atmosphere it is trying to create(4 versus 1 is not an easy game to make, not to mention one where you can freely choose to be the monster as opposed to waiting your turn)
Naturally there are going to be issues that need to be addressed as the killer/survivor nerf war goes on, and it needs to be expected. For the most part, its relatively fair. I barely get ANY time to play and video games anymore, and I can log in, as a killer, hunt some survivors, get a few kills, (and have a few where a well-coordinated group of survivors destroys me) and I have fun. The biggest issue people are having is with the community. Here's the thing, if you pay these people any mind whatsoever, that's on you. Yes, every time I play, someone pipes up at the end of game chat complaining about some tactic, and every time I laugh about it (There is no such thing as "hook-camping". period!). If you choose to sit at the hook and watch the lone survivor you caught die, that's on you, and it is 100 percent okay to play like that....whats *supposed* to happen is the survivors are supposed to use that to their advantage(while your camping, they know your not moving). Most do....of course we're still left with a salty survivor who got killed and is waiting for his 5 seconds at the end of the game to tell you all about it. Ignore that clown. Play the game how you want to play it, and have fun doing it. Look at the community as neat little "bonus"(some of it is funny......I had a player tell me "NoScope huh? more like NO SKILL" and I almost pee'd myself laughing so hard)

After being on and off with the game since 2016, I continue to play. Regardless of how toxic the fans can be, I will never not love this game. It's been the only game I can come back to and play. Yes, there are bugs. Yes, there are imbalanced perks. But the overall experience is fun, as long as you let it be. Don't expect every game to be fair/ Some players play hardcore, whilst others play casual. Just get them bloodpoints and shards, and be happy spending. :)

Кидаешь паллету прямо на голову маньяку, но тут происходит магия в чистом ее проявлении. Анимация  удара даже близко не прошла по модельке моего персонажа. Но мне зачитали это как за удар. Охурмено! Меня убил поток воздуха. Так давайте добавим прогноз погоды в нашу DbD. Пусть у выживших будут подношения на волшебный, исцеляющий дождь. А маньякам добавим подношение на усиление ветра. Чтобы выживших к хуям выбрасывало с карты! А что? Люди как-то же попадают за текстуры, так давайте сделаем эту зону смертельной для выживших.

YES! i think every true gamer out there should play dbd because it will make you a better gamer.  the skills you will gain from this game are:
1. map awareness
2. enemy positioning by sound
3. ranked rewards for individual skill
4. 1 vs 1 mechanical mind game skills that can be utilized in other games
5. realizing your role/duty you have to perform in a team game format
HOWEVER! some things about this game i would change:
1. camping killers.

[h1]Introduction[/h1]
Dead by Daylight - or dbd - is an asymmetrical multiplayer game where you can play as one of four survivors, or as a killer. Survivors need to repair five out of seven generators on a given map to turn on the two gates, open them, and escape from the killer. The killer WILL FIND YOU, and you must buy time for other survivors to repair generators using pallets, windows, and the power of toxicity. You can play solo with random pubs, or with any amount of friends up to three. Each killer has unique powers to serve the survivors' lives to The Entity

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Attractive art/graphic style that compliments the theme of the game perfectly.
    [*]Simple but addictive gameplay that has hooked me for over 800 hrs, as you can see
    [*]Many many maps, with small randomly generated aspects to spice up the gameplay
    [*]Survivor tools, addons, as well as killer addons also helps give the game more replayability
    [*]You always have something to work towards. Leveling up characters, getting new perks, prestiging characters, going for steam achievements, this will all last you over 1000 hours if you last that long.
    [*]Interesting world/lore, top notch killer designs.
    [*]Developer streams, roadmaps, overall good communication with the devs and consistent updates
    [*]Start off scaring your pants off, play long enough to experience the fun, more competitive side of the game. There is always room for some casual fun, memes, and shenanigans.
[/list]

[h1]Up To You[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Base Game + All DLC at full price is currently $107. That's a lot of nickle and diming, but it's mostly pretty nice content. [b]You can buy dlc characters in the in-game store, using currency earned by playing the game.[/b]
    [*]Microtransactions - Cosmetic only. Thing is, darker clothes give a small edge for survivors, but technically you have access to dark clothes from the start, so it's not pay to win. It's optional, can be bought by playing (**A LOT**). Items in the store look good, and you can actually see youself wearing what you buy since survivors are in third person. Killers well... they see their weapon in-game, and the skin in the lobby.
[/list]

[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Core gameplay flaws - For more skilled, competitive players,
    [*]Microtransactions - Cosmetic only. Thing is, darker clothes give a small edge for survivors, but technically you have access to dark clothes from the start, so it's not pay to win. It's optional, can be bought by playing (**A LOT**). Items in the store look good, and you can actually see youself wearing what you buy since survivors are in third person. Killers well... they see their weapon in-game, and the skin in the lobby.
    [*]Long-ish queue times lasting several minutes. Not always the case, and has improved overtime.
    [*]Community can be VERY toxic. People in general get upset in this game, they will let you know when they are, and it will be your fault.
    [*]The developers don't play their game, and when they do they suck at it, and dont understand the higher skilled level of play
    [*]The previous point leads to bad balancing. For new players, killers can be very difficult to deal with, especially with their "rank system," high-skilled killers purposefully bring themselves into lower-skilled games. This is because high-ranked games are a nightmare for killers. The devs don't know how to balance it, and survivors with enough skill will always survive unless you use the most powerful killers.
[/list]

[h1]Summary[/h1]
dbd is a game I have a love-hate relationship with. The gameplay is addictive, the world and lore intriguing, with large amounts of quality content and infinite replayability that makes it one of my favorite games of all time. However, I have personally been plagued by issues that make the game difficult to play, or unplayable, through most of my 800+ hrs, although it seems I am a rare case. On top of possible game-breaking issues (crashing, anti-cheat false-positives), the game has an issue with balancing, which can be difficult in an asymmetrical multiplayer game. The community is very toxic and sometimes it can take a long time to find matches (10+ mins living in US-East) though long queue times are less common these days. But believe me, surviving with friends and killing unfortunate souls is worth it.

Fun gameplay most of the time, but there are parts that literally just encourage repetitive sprain injury and keyboard/controller damage that the devs and community defend as being acceptable because the INTENTION of the feature is to physically harm you.

Outside of the literally painful gameplay there is the mentally painful matchmaking system which puts players of wildly different rank together, a buggy lobby system unfixed for years, loading screens that crash at least one out of every three matches, outsourced anti-cheating programs so that the devs admit might falsely ban you with no recourse, and absurd amounts of grinding and dedication to unlock perks, followed by absurd amounts of grinding and dedication to RE-unlock the perks potentially on over 10 characters. Unless you pay of course~
Includes malware (EAC)
I'm really just doing this for a badge, but in all honesty, the game is pretty good, so give it a try

OLA POBRE IMUNDO. VENHO AQUI LHE AJUDAR A GASTAR  ESSES SEUS MISEROS 40 REAIS QUE VOCE LUTA TANTO PRA TER DENTRO DESSA SUA CONTA BANCARIA DEPRESSIVA. 
TE RECOMENDO ESSE JOGO PARA QUE VOCE GASTE SUAS HORAS DE  VIDA INUTIL, NAO ME ENTENDA MAL SEU BURRO DO CARALH.O, EU REALMENTE RECOMENDO O JOGO E ESTOU LHE ACONSELHANDO A COMPRAR PARA QUE EU CAIA CONTRA VOCE E TE FAÇA PASSAR RAIVA SEU FODID.O ARROGANTE. 
O JOGO CONTEM VARIAS DLC QUE SEU DINHEIRO POBRE NÃO CONSEGUE COMPRAR, MAS SE VOCE JOGAR BASTANTE, JA QUE TEM TEMPO LIVRE PRA CARALHO SEU VAGABUNDO SUJO, VOCE CONSEGUE COMPRAR OS BONEQUINHOS SEM GASTAR O DINHEIRO DA SUA MAE. 

AGORA VOU TE EXPLICAR UM POUCO DO JOGO SEU LEZADO. 
AQUI TEMOS DOIS MODOS DE JOGO, O DOS SOBREVIVENTES TRISTES E O DO ASSASSINO SANGUINARIO SEM CORAÇÃO. ISSO MESMO SEU VERME ARROGANTE É BEM O QUE SEU CEREBRO INFERIOR PENSOU, É UM JOGO 4 X 1 ONDE 4 SOBREVIVENTES SE UNEM E TRABALHAM EM CONJUNTO PARA FUGIR DO ASSASSINO. POREM NÓS DOIS SABEMOS QUE VOCE VAI SER UM SOBREVIVENTE DE MER.DA, VAI ABANDONAR SEUS AMIGOS E TENTAR FUGIR SOZINHO SEU DESGRAÇAD.O SEM ALMA, MAS AQUI EU JA LHE CONTO QUE SE VOCE NAO TRABALHAR EM CONJUNTO VOCE NAO SOBE DE RANK SEU ANIMAL. SÓ QUE CASO VOCE SEJA UM FRACOTE E QUEIRA TENTAR SER UM ASSASSINO DEPOIS DE TANTAS FRUSTRAÇÕES POR SER UM HORRIVEL, ENTAO VOCE DEVE SE PREPARAR PARA UM MAR DE RAIVA COM SOBREVIVENTES FILHOS DE UMA FRUTA QUE FICAM AGACHANDO NA SUA FRENTE DEPOIS DE DERRUBAR CAIXAS DE MADEIRA E TE ESTUNAR POR UMA ETERNIDADE SEU CORNO DO CARALH.O 

ENTAO A DICA É JOGAR DE SOBREVIVENTE COM SEUS AMIGOS E FAZER UM OTÁRI.O POR AI PASSAR RAIVA TENTANDO MATAR VOCES. 

NOTA DO JOGO: A.V.C. GARANTIDO PARA QUE VOCE POSSA DE APOSENTAR POR INVALIDEZ

If you happen to come to the reviews to see if you should buy this game, hi, and let me tell you one thing..

This game is so fricking fun, and yes i have to say fricking, or else this fucking happens. I dont want to get into how the game works, as you can find tones of nice YouTube videos of exactly that.

I am going to tell you that this game is wonderful to play, it is fun, and you can switch between killer/survivor if you feel it's getting a bit too repetitive. Although the community is a bit toxic (people yelling slurs at/harrassing other people for simply playing to their advantage)

A empresa basicamente favorece buffs em killer enquanto nerfa survivors. Nunca houve um balanceamento justo para ambos. O jogo contem bugs tremendos. A comunidade e toxica principalmente por esses motivos.

Угробили когда-то интересную игру. Техническими проблемами как не занимались, так и не занимаются. Баланс был хоть какой-то, за счет скилла некоторых игроков. Когда ввели Кроссплатформенность, началась просто несусветная дичь. Выжившие в матче стали просто никакие.

Не видитесь на красивые картинки, на самом деле это баганутая помойка с дебилами игроками, как с одной (сурвы), так и с другой стороны (киллеры). 

Помощи в 90% процентов нет никакой. Ранк игроков не соответствует их реальному уровню игры, также на 90%.

Куча киллеров со слитыми аккаунтами 17 ранка, с фулл перками 3 уровня, либо со смурф акков. В итоге киллер с серым ранком спокойно выигрывает игроков желтого или зеленого ранка.

Не стоит никаких денег, даже со скидкой. Не совершайте ошибок, пройдите мимо этой игры.

Пока не введут нормальный и рабочий рейтинг порядочности, как в той же Дота 2, эта игра будет с каждым годом все хуже и хуже. Или ввели бы хотя бы подбор игроков, также ориентируясь на их часы проведенные в игре. Ранк можно забустить, а вот со временем в игре сложнее.
Dead by daylight will make your heart beat and you will feel the tension when sneaking around or getting chased by a raving psycopath! A must have for everyone who like horror!

Still a good game (played since before the nurse got released), has some quirks that need to be polished, namely:

1. Hit boxes (low hanging fruit, nothing new, just get it fixed already)

2. Matchmaking: Still has 22,000 avg (52,000 peak) players (on steam alone) and yet when i play killer or survivor, i end up either with a lot of 7 - 4 ranked players or the other side of the coin with 20 - 16, or a mixture of both. (Rank 15 killer and rank 10 survivor as of this)

3. Gen rushing: I don't know of a real way to fix this, but if the queue for killers wasn't so long, i think there wouldn't be as much whining about it. Still its annoying playing killer and survivor (it makes the game go to fast on both sides, and is honestly boring).

I personally don't care about toxicity, i tend to see more nicer players then i do toxic, and 90% of the time if i do, its for justifiable reasons (aka DC's, killers that are obviously tunneling certain people/ camping, its boring come on. etc) Or its the killer themselves not liking being gen rushed. Either way just give a simple gg and move on, no one cares what you think about that one match, its just a game.

Игра огонь, рекомендую всем!!!

До того, как добавили клоуна это была нормальная игра, да даже с ним играть ещё можно было, но эта китайская коза, а потом ещё и легион окончательно убили игру.

ОНИ СЛАБЫ, а сурвы, особенно токсичные сами берут на себя роль охотника, от чего новые маны ох уевают.

Некоторые люди покупают этих манов за свои кровные, а потом их е.бут в жору. Несправедливо однако, при том что бесплатные сурвы по типу нюрсы или хиллбилли неоправдано сильны, в то время как фрэдди нервно курит в сторонке, пока я снимаю друга с крюка. 
Короче говоря, игру нужно кардинально менять и апать всех манов. ВСЕХ БЛИН, без исключений. Не заставляйте ведьму плакать.

UPD: много воды утекло, но игра по прежнему кал. Даже рейтинговую систему сделали как во всех других играх, теперь вместо хоть какой-то оригинальности в рангах 20-1 имеем стандартное золото... немезис г.ов.но кста

Very good game overall. However, there are many improvements that I hope to see implemented throughout the 4th Year of Dead By Daylight. One feature I would like to see changed is those damn hit boxes. They are very broken if I am to be honest, you could be a mile away from the Killer and they will be able to lunge and hit you. 

Another feature that could be added is a sort of matchmaking sorting system (although you already have one), the reason I am saying this is because when I was rank 15, I was getting matched with ranks 3's and 4's which were much more advanced than me. 

Thank you, and yes the game is great!
